mapper.select: SELECT service_name, api_name, check_api FROM tb_service LEFT JOIN tb_api ON tb_service.service_code = tb_api.service_code
SELECT id, name, dept_name, phone_number, email FROM tb_admin, tb_dept where tb_admin.dept_code = tb_dept.dept_code
SELECT IDX, HIT_CNT, CREA_ID, CREA_DTM, TITLE, CONTENTS FROM TB_BOARD WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET HIT_CNT = IFNULL(HIT_CNT, 0) + 1 WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BOARD ( TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT_CNT, DEL_GB, CREA_DTM, CREA_ID ) VALUES ( #{TITLE}, #{CONTENTS}, 0, 'N', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'Admin' )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_BOARD SET DEL_GB = 'Y' WHERE IDX = #{IDX}
